alert.note: Alert for Crisp (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crisp County through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Arabi, or 9 miles south of Cordele, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Arabi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
